1011011011001001 0010110001000100 1 -> sum: 1110001100001110, cout: 0

1011111101101100 1100010110110100 1 -> sum: 1000010100100001, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
